verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> the mean time <S%G3739><s%>, when there were gathered together <S%G1996><s%> an innumerable multitude <S%G3461><s%> of people <S%G3793><s%>, insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> they trode <S%G2662><s%> one upon another <S%G240><s%>, he began <S%G756><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> first of all <S%G4412><s%>, Beware <S%G4337><s%> ye <S%G1438><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%>.
